1111309117900115968.text: Get real. You really think science teachers are to blame for flat-earthers? It’s the internet, where free speech runs rampant.https://twitter.com/neiltyson/status/1111295662920888320 …

1111314547594461185.text: Flat Earthers represent a population that have a fundamental misunderstanding of science. A greater confidence in the teachers and the curriculum taught would allow kids to be skeptical of questionable sources that undermine concrete scientific theory.

1111323914658037761.text: I agree. People, particularly famous scientists, shouldn’t undermine the education system and teachers by putting the blame on them.

1111324901665853440.text: I think you guys aren’t giving this flat earth theory enough credit. Have you ever seen the earth from space? No. Only in pictures. The earth may be flat. It very well could be. The government could be trying to trick us!!!

1111325099586711555.text: Clearly the Iowan educational system failed @KyleHart3

1111326521694867457.text: JORDAN. We just said we weren’t gonna do that. It’s Kyle’s fault that he’s an idiot with a misunderstanding of science.

1111331040960884736.text: When you guys go on a cruise and fall off the earth don’t say I never warned you.
